articles.title: About us
articles.infos: Trident Modular Housing is a bespoke garden room, modular building designer, and manufacturer.
articles.infos2: An enterprise combining the joint expertise of a UK-based chartered architectural practice and an experienced Ukrainian manufacturer.
articles.infos3: Our main aim is to provide our customers with a fast, cost-effective service. We are able to achieve this with the help of the newest building technologies for manufacturing and assembly.
articles.body: Trident Modular Housing produce and assemble modular houses that are very high quality and they can be used as temporary as well as permanent residence.
articles.info: An enterprise combining the joint expertise of a UK-based chartered architectural practice and an experienced Ukrainian manufacturer

cardInfo.title: QUICK TURNAROUND
cardInfo.text: Two to three months from order to completion on site.

cardInfo.title: LOW COST
cardInfo.text: Timber-frame structures manufactured off site with high precision in factory conditions.

cardInfo.title: FLEXIBILITY
cardInfo.text: Finishing, specification and appliances to meet your requirements.

cardInfo.title: TOP QUALITY
cardInfo.text: Trident Modular Housing LTD buildings are cheaper than those of our competitors.t
